metadata.title: CVE-2021-34557 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: XScreenSaver 5.45 can be bypassed if the machine has more than tendisconnectable video outputs. A buffer overflow in update_screen_layout()allows an attacker to bypass the standard screen lock authenticationmechanism by crashing XScreenSaver. The attacker must physically disconnectmany video outputs.

criterions.comment: xscreensaver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
